name: Jawa
Lore: 'Every now and then, Jawas will pause in their scavenging duties to take in a Podrace. Many believe this is only because they want to be first to a crash scene.',
Text: 'Deploys only on Tatooine. To deploy, requires 1 Force from each players'' Force Pile. Power +1 on Tatooine. While with another Jawa, if opponent just initiated a Force drain at adjacent site, may use 2 Force to reduce it by 1.',
